original_text: When your ancestors went to Egypt, they were only 70 people. Now the Lord your God has caused you to become very many people. You are as many as the stars in the sky!
korean_text: 애굽에 내려간 네 조상들이 겨우 칠십 인이었으나 이제는 네 하나님 여호와께서 너를 하늘의 별 같이 많게 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: When your ancestors went to Egypt
has caused you to become very many people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 아주 많은 사람이 되게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: You are as many as the stars in the sky
